column4: actually, I am looking for the detail documents to explain how the ubuntu boot up process, especially how GDM/KDM taking over the control and load up the X.  also taking user selected WM into consideration

anyone can point me the right direction?   for the detail documents to explain how the ubuntu boot up process, especially how GDM/KDM taking over the control and load up the X. also taking user selected WM into consideration
gdm/kdm just launch as one of the last services - nothing really special about that,
gdm/kdm look for various 'Whatever.desktop' files to define what 'sessions' they show in their session menu - look for gnome.desktop for an example of such a file.
